name: The Great Machine (yakulbeans)
description:
Enter to begin game, use arrow keys to move left and right

Have fun! Any feedback is greatly appreciated, I'm still very new to coding, and have been learning along the cs50 game dev course from harvard. I'm thankful javid encouraged coders of all levels, because I didn't think I'd be good enough to submit to this, but I had a lot of fun and I'm glad I tried it!
